search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Canny (canny.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Canny is: [https://canny.io/pricing](https://canny.io/pricing)【3:0†source】.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Discounts available for startups and specific industries.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Set up your feedback portal with just the basics.
Get more out of your feedback with advanced tools.
Scale insights across your team with integrations and automations.
Deploy additional permissions, compliance, and customizations.
features: Optional add-ons: Authentication integrations, Salesforce integration, HubSpot integration, White label, Security review

promotional_offers.offer_description: Discounts on the Growth plan for early-stage companies: 75% off for the first year, 50% off for the second.
Save up to 20% by paying for a year upfront.
Discounts for companies in healthcare, non-profit, and education sectors.

additional_fees.fee_description: $18/month per additional admin for Starter plan.
$36/month per additional admin for Growth plan.
